data.name: Crunchyroll Large video player
data.description: Enlarges video player without need of fullscreen. Unlike some of the other Large Player styles, this style encompasses all aspects of the website as to enable it permanently and not just while watching videos. Taking into consideration the resizing of the layout for everything from the Homepage to shows information pages.

data.name: Restore YouTube Small Thumbnails and Trending page
data.description:
Allows you to restore and define the amount of columns present on the Home page (default: 6).
Allows you to restore the Trending page on two columns instead of one.
